Permanently REMOTEJob Title: Engineering Manager/Manager of Data AnalyticsSalary: $150k-$200k Base + Equity, Benefits, 401kRequirements: Direct Reports, Python Programming (read/write), AWS Services, Great CommunicationBacked by the same people behind Comcast and NBCUniversal, there is confidence that our TV Advertising Platform is already impacting the way brands and apps use advertisements. Having recently secured our Series A Funding round, we are searching for another talented Software Engineering Manager to work alongside our team of EX Amazon, DirecTV and OpenX Engineers.As an Engineering Manager you'll be managing a mid sized team of remote engineers on our CTV / OTT focused ad-buying platform. You'll have a strong understanding of core engineering principles and production experience with software engineering techniques like automated testing, source control, deployment pipelines, infrastructure, and agile planning. You've built web based products before and have hands-on experience managing and developing engineering talent. We're looking for someone driven to build amazing products with the end-user in mind.We're a remote first company that is focused on a streamlined and impactful use of developer time. The team you manage will have a direct and meaningful impact to the company and customers.What You Will Be Doing Design, implement, and refine development and testing processes. Manage staff and assign tasks to engineering and technical personnel. Lead your team in the development of new features, client requests, and bug resolutions in a reporting visualization layer and data orchestration system. Oversee project logistics and resource allocation. Communicate technical information to non-technical stakeholders. Collaborate with other team leaders and departments. Gauge progress of various projects. Hire and train new employees.What You Need for this Position A great attitude. A BS/MS in Computer Science or equivalent on the job experience. Strong problem-solving skills. Production experience with either Airflow, Beam or Argo and comfortable with evaluating and migrating to similar tools if needed. Experience with AWS services. Experience with Python. Strong communication, interpersonal, and conflict resolution skills Flexible thinking, including the ability to pivot and try new approaches when faced with challenges. Experience writing integration and unit tests. Strong problem-solving skills and ability to learn/adapt to new technologies. Top-notch remote communication skills. Ability to work on multiple projects in various stages simultaneously. A lead from the front style leader. Ability to work under pressure and iterate quickly against rapidly updating plansBonus Adtech Experience. Specific Domain Experience in CTV. Experience working within or managing a microservice architecture. Experience working with or managing a customer-facing reporting / analytics system. Experience working with D3 or similar charter libraries. An understanding of Linux. Experience working with Django, Flask or similar python based web frameworks. Experience with Looker.What's In It for You Competitive compensation and benefits package that includes Full Health, dental, and vision insurance - partially funded by the company Employee stock option program Company-sponsored retirement plan with a matching contribution program 11 annual paid holidays (including 2 flexible days) Generous PTO policy (get your work done and take the time you need) A remote-first environment that allows FTEs to work from anywhere in the US Available for purchase - Life, LTD insurance Generous paid parental, pregnancy, and medical leave plan Access to our Employee Assistance ProgramBenefits Vacation/PTO Dental Medical 401k Vision EquitySo, if you are a Manager of Data Analytics with experience, please apply today!Colorado employees will receive paid sick leave. For additional information about available benefits, please contact Taylor McAlisterEmail Your Resume In Word ToLooking forward to receiving your resume through our website and going over the position with you. Clicking apply is the best way to apply, but you may also:Taylor.McAlister@CyberCoders.comPlease do NOT change the email subject line in any way. You must keep the JobID: linkedin : TM4-1728697 -- in the email subject line for your application to be considered.***Taylor McAlister - Sr. Executive Recruiter - CyberCodersApplicants must be authorized to work in the U.S.CyberCoders, Inc is proud to be an Equal Opportunity EmployerAll qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, disability, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law.Your Right to Work – In compliance with federal law, all persons hired will be required to verify identity and eligibility to work in the United States and to complete the required employment eligibility verification document form upon hire.CyberCoders will consider for Employment in the City of Los Angeles qualified Applicants with Criminal Histories in a manner consistent with the requirements of the Los Angeles Fair Chance Initiative for Hiring (Ban the Box) Ordinance.
